NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted to signal this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"finalize(uint8,bool)":{"params":{"invalid_":"Whether the market is invalid (true = pro-rata refund)","winning":"The winning outcome index"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"getTotalVolume()":{"returns":{"_0":"Total volume in collateral token units"}},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"redeem(uint8,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of shares to redeem","outcomeId":"The outcome index to redeem"},"returns":{"payout":"The amount of collateral paid out"}},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"requestResolve()":{"details":"Transitions market from Trading to Resolving state"},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas."},"sweepFeesToTreasury(uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"Amount of fees to sweep (0 = sweep all)"}}},"title":"LMSRMarket","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"PRBMath_MulDiv18_Overflow(uint256,uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when the resultant value in {mulDiv18} overflows params.invalid_: Whether the market is invalid (true = pro-rata refund)

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

returns._0: Total volume in collateral token units

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

params.amount: The amount of shares to redeem

returns.payout: The amount of collateral paid out

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

requestResolve().details: Transitions market from Trading to Resolving state

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

params.amount: Amount of fees to sweep (0 = sweep all)

availableCollateralAtFinalization().notice: Available collateral at finalization (for pro-rata calculation).

collateralDecimals().notice: Decimals of the collateral token (for normalization to UD60x18).

feeReserve().notice: Accumulated fees pending withdrawal (raw ERC-20 units).

finalize(uint8,bool).notice: Finalize the market with the winning outcome (callable only by oracle)

liquidityB().notice: Liquidity sensitivity parameter (b) expressed as UD60x18.

marketId().notice: Identifier of the market within the Outcome1155 contract.

outcomeCount().notice: Number of outcomes supported by this market.

redeem(uint8,uint256).notice: Redeem shares for payout after market finalization

requestResolve().notice: Request resolution from the oracle (only callable after trading ends)

sweepFeesToTreasury(uint256).notice: Sweep collected fees to Treasury for distribution

totalSharesAtFinalization().notice: Total shares at finalization (for pro-rata calculation).

tradeFee().notice: Trading fee percentage expressed as UD60x18.

tradingPaused().notice: Flag indicating whether trading is paused.

treasury().notice: Treasury contract address for fee collection.

winningOutcome().notice: Winning outcome index (valid only when finalized).
